projects.title: Network Penetration Testing Lab
projects.objective: Build a virtualized network environment to practice penetration testing techniques
projects.methodology: Created isolated VMs using VirtualBox with vulnerable machines (Metasploitable, DVWA) and Kali Linux as attacking platform
projects.learnings: Gained hands-on experience with reconnaissance, exploitation, and post-exploitation techniques.

projects.title: Web Application Security Testing
projects.objective: Identify and exploit common web vulnerabilities in controlled environments
projects.methodology: Systematic testing of OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities using automated and manual techniques
projects.learnings: Deep understanding of SQL injection, XSS, CSRF, and remediation strategies.
